channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Survivors sue Illinois over decades of sexual abuse at Chicago youth detention center
item.description: Nearly 200 men and women are alleging they were sexually abused as children while at a Chicago youth detention facility.

item.title: Massachusetts issues tighter restrictions on access to homeless shelter system
item.description: Massachusetts Gov. Maura Healey has unveiled new restrictions on the state’s homeless family shelter programs.

item.title: Steve Bannon’s trial in border wall fundraising case set for December, after his ongoing prison term
item.description: While conservative strategist Steve Bannon is serving a four-month federal prison term, he’s got another trial coming up.
